Color scale constructor for bakeoff colors

Source: R/ggplot2_scales.R
scale_bakeoff.Rd

Color scale constructor for bakeoff colors

Fill scale constructor for bakeoff colors

scale_color_bakeoff(
  palette = "showstopper",
  discrete = TRUE,
  direction = 1,
  ...
)

scale_fill_bakeoff(
  palette = "showstopper",
  discrete = TRUE,
  direction = 1,
  ...
)

Arguments

palette

Character name of palette in bakeoff_palette
discrete

Boolean indicating whether color aesthetic is discrete or not
direction

Either 1 or -1. If -1, the palette will be reversed.
...

Additional arguments passed to discrete_scale() or scale_fill_gradientn(), used respectively when discrete is TRUE or FALSE

Examples


if (require('ggplot2')) {

  ggplot(ratings, aes(x = episode, y = viewers_7day, group = series, color = series)) +
    geom_line(lwd = 3) +
    theme_minimal() +
    scale_color_bakeoff("finale", guide = FALSE)
}

if (require('ggplot2')) {

  ggplot(ratings, aes(x = episode_count, y = viewers_7day, fill = series)) +
    geom_col() +
    theme_minimal() +
    scale_fill_bakeoff("finale", guide = FALSE)
}
